statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, traffic_speed FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT route_id, AVG(traffic_speed) AS avg_speed FROM TrafficData GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level < 2 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY traffic_speed DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT route_id FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level = 0 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_id, AVG(traffic_speed) AS avg_speed FROM TrafficData GROUP BY route_id HAVING AVG(traffic_speed) > 50 ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;
SELECT timestamp, route_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY congestion_level ASC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT route_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_speed < 30 ORDER BY route_id ASC, congestion_level DESC;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM TrafficData GROUP BY route_id ORDER BY total_records DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RouteData WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM RouteData WHERE distance_km > 50;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM RouteData ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM RouteData ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT congestion_id, timestamp, congestion_level FROM CongestionData WHERE congestion_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM RouteData;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM RouteData ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM RouteData WHERE distance_km > 10;
SELECT route_name, end_location, distance_km FROM RouteData WHERE start_location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT r.route_id, r.route_name, c.timestamp, c.congestion_level FROM RouteData r INNER JOIN CongestionData c ON r.route_id = c.route_id WHERE c.congestion_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data ORDER BY current_speed ASC;
SELECT route_name, current_speed FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE traffic_conditions='Heavy Traffic';
SELECT id, distance, estimated_time FROM route_optimization WHERE distance > 10 AND optimum_speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM congestion_analysis WHERE congestion_level='High' ORDER BY delay_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, current_speed, traffic_conditions FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE current_speed BETWEEN 30 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE current_speed > 50 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, traffic_conditions FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy Traffic' ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_id, distance, congestion_level FROM route_optimization WHERE distance < 10 AND congestion_level = 'Low' ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT id, route_id, delay_time FROM congestion_analysis WHERE delay_time > 30 ORDER BY route_id ASC, delay_time DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, current_speed, traffic_conditions FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE current_speed < 30 AND traffic_conditions = 'Moderate Traffic' ORDER BY current_speed ASC, route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData;
SELECT route_id, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion_level = 'high';
SELECT route_id, timestamp, speed FROM TrafficData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT route_id, congestion_level, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM TrafficData GROUP BY route_id, congestion_level;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, location, camera_type FROM TrafficCameras WHERE camera_type = 'fixed';
SELECT timestamp, congestion_level FROM CongestionAnalysis WHERE route_id = 2 AND congestion_level = 'high';

SELECT data_id, timestamp, congestion_level FROM TrafficData INNER JOIN CongestionAnalysis ON TrafficData.route_id = CongestionAnalysis.route_id AND TrafficData.timestamp = CongestionAnalysis.timestamp;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT route_name, traffic_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_speed > 60;
SELECT location, description FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY reported_on DESC;
SELECT recommendation_id, route_name, recommended_speed, estimated_time_minutes FROM route_recommendations WHERE estimated_time_minutes < 30;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_congestion_level = 3;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY route_name ASC, traffic_speed DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_speed > 50 AND traffic_congestion_level <= 2;
SELECT location, traffic_speed FROM traffic_cameras JOIN traffic_data ON traffic_cameras.traffic_data_id = traffic_data.id WHERE traffic_speed < 40;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type='Accident' AND location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT route_name, recommended_speed, estimated_time_minutes FROM route_recommendations WHERE recommended_speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY estimated_time_minutes ASC;
